meanings.definition: Not shortened or condensed; complete in its original form.
meanings.sent1: The unabridged version of the book contained all the details.
meanings.sent2: I prefer reading unabridged novels because I enjoy the full story.
meanings.sent3: She insisted on giving an unabridged account of her day, including every little detail.
meanings.sent4: His unabridged honesty was refreshing in a world full of deceit.
meanings.sent5: The unabridged truth finally came out, revealing the whole story.

meanings.definition: Not abridged; not shortened by omitting parts.
meanings.sent1: The unabridged dictionary includes all the words in the English language.
meanings.sent2: I bought the unabridged version of the movie to see all the scenes.
meanings.sent3: His unabridged enthusiasm for the project was contagious.
meanings.sent4: The unabridged forest stretched as far as the eye could see.
meanings.sent5: The unabridged speech lasted for hours, covering every topic imaginable.
